episodes.title: The Red Serpent
episodes.plot: Spartacus, a free man of Thrace, agrees to join the Romans to battle his tribe's enemies. A betrayal sends his life spinning out of control.

episodes.title: Sacramentum Gladiatorum
episodes.plot: Enslaved at a school for gladiators, a defiant Spartacus is blackmailed in an attempt to make him comply.

episodes.title: Legends
episodes.plot: Spartacus schemes to earn money in a bid to see his wife again.

episodes.title: The Thing in the Pit
episodes.plot: After a poor showing in the Arena, Spartacus is consigned to the Pit, a place of pain and suffering.

episodes.title: Shadow Games
episodes.plot: Spartacus and Crixus face an undefeated giant gladiator. If they don't overcome their hatred for one another and work as a team, he will kill them both.

episodes.title: Delicate Things
episodes.plot: Learning that his wife arrives tomorrow, Spartacus plans a daring escape.

episodes.title: Great and Unfortunate Things
episodes.plot: Spartacus is forced to play a roman fighter in the games against a group of thracians, as he recalls his wife and how he met her. Meanwhile, there are some mysteries surrounding Barca's freedom as Pietros tries to deal with it.

episodes.title: Mark of the Brotherhood
episodes.plot: Batiatus purchases new slaves during an auction to be trained as gladiators, and trouble arises.

episodes.title: Whore
episodes.plot: Batiatus breaks the news that Spartacus is to service the richest woman in Rome.

episodes.title: Party Favors
episodes.plot: Spartacus fights in an exhibition match for Numerius' birthday - but Crixus is intent on blood.

episodes.title: Old Wounds
episodes.plot: Spartacus hovers on the brink. Meanwhile, Batiatus plots revenge against his enemies.

episodes.title: Revelations
episodes.plot: Lucretia and Batiatus await the arrival of Glaber with the intentions to receive his patronage, while Spartacus focuses attention on his plan for revenge.

episodes.title: Kill Them All
episodes.plot: An epic battle between Spartacus and his gladiator brothers, against Batiatus and his Guards.
